list.name: Default
list.comment:
Updated functionality.
- new Command: PlayerInfoCommand() - Dueling has a fancy styled output. - tests written for new functionality.

MESSAGE.value:
Progress on building the game.
- Minor changes to comments - Updated game loop - Addition of 'final' modifier in a few places - Updates to Console functionality

Progress on building the game.
- Creation of Player object to house data about Player. - Creation of ProcessConstant object to signal responses from processInput() method - Modified gson reader to read into static variables as well - Added an helper method in Game for processInput() - Added functionality to Player and Room objects, allowing the addition or removal of items. - Removed excessive use of 'final' modifier.

Finished base games.
- Gson now reads into static variables. - Fixed small issues in Console, and added 'list' function. - Small bug fixes: no items in room, null in items - Small changes to output cycle.

Bug Fixes
- fixed bug that prevented taking items with names with a space (ie. more than one word) in them

Map Validator
- added a map validator - expanded Layout to handle getting json from files - new exception: InvalidMapException - created a test json that FAILS THE TEST :0 Also, added the circular.json file as another test file - updated testing suite

Comments
- Added/fixed a few comments.

Changes to structure.
- Added in new requirements - Changes to fundamental structure of the game... - An updated JSON file was created. - Updated test file to accomodate changes.

Updates.
- Room objects now can work with monsters. - Console prints out the monsters in the room.

Output & Comments
- addition of printlnExtra(String s, int amount), which allows the user to print about extra lines if necessary - commented Game class thoroughly - small changes to output of the game
Remove loose final modifiers.

Minor changes.
- Fixed test cases. - Thoroughly commented the MapValidator class. - Fixed a few minor output methods.

Commmenting quite a bit.
- Added/expanded upon comments in multiple classes.
Finished commenting EVERYTHING.

Updated comments.
- Added comments inside of the Console.processInput() method - Updated explanation describing the Builder pattern.

Updated test cases.
- Test cases are much more extensive now. - Fixed a small error the JSON file.

Test Cases; Professor IntelliJ.
- Also, fixed up the javadoc/comments in a few places. - SEPARATED ALL THE TEST CASES!!! - Minor tweaks, like putting the main method in a class outside of all the packages so IntelliJ will stop telling me 'hey can this class be package-access please? thanks.' - Listened to IntelliJ and let it make some things final. Wololo, the magic of learning.

Wrapped up tests.
- Finished up creating tests with Console class, including all sorts of reading I/O shenanigans.

Restructured Console.processInput()
- Introduction of a Command interface, which all commands inherit from. As a result, the processInput() method simply returns a Command object. Game.gameloop() will execute it.

Tests.
- Wrote tests for the new Command style of processing.
Light javadoc work.
Updated explanation in Layout.
Updated JSON, small stylish changes for output.
Some more small stylistic changes.

Updated functionality.
- Can enter duels and disengage them. - Wrote tests for them.

Updated functionality.
- Some stylistic changes to I/O to prevent clutter, including only printing name and description of room upon moving between rooms.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Updated functionality.
- Some stylistic changes to I/O to prevent clutter, including only printing name and description of room upon moving between rooms.
